body_content.explanation: having good judgment about what will happen in the future and the ability to make wise decisions based on this:
examples: His foreign policy was a combination of longsighted achievements and short-sighted blunders.
They showed themselves to be broad-minded, mature, and long-sighted.

body_content.explanation: A longsighted person can only clearly see objects that are far away:
examples: Convex lenses help those who are longsighted; concave lenses those who are short-sighted.
Long-sighted people are unable to see close objects clearly.
